survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on customer satisfaction and preferences regarding home gardening tools and equipment.

questions.question_text: How often do you engage in home gardening activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for simplicity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you engage in home gardening activities?

questions.question_text: Which types of gardening tools do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select options. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). The 'Other' option should trigger an open-text field.

script.question_text: Which types of gardening tools do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the durability of the gardening tools you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the durability of the gardening tools you currently use?

questions.question_text: What is the primary factor you consider when purchasing gardening tools?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with an optional open-text field for 'Other' responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary factor you consider when purchasing gardening tools?

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with the ergonomics of your gardening tools?
questions.client_notes: Binary response to filter respondents for follow-up questions.

script.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with the ergonomics of your gardening tools?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the ergonomic issues you have faced.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the ergonomic issues you have faced.

questions.question_text: Which brands of gardening tools do you prefer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with an 'Other' option for unlisted brands.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which brands of gardening tools do you prefer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important is eco-friendliness when selecting gardening tools?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure importance levels.

script.question_text: How important is eco-friendliness when selecting gardening tools?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in gardening tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture suggestions for product improvements.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in gardening tools?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in a focus group to discuss gardening tools?
questions.client_notes: Simple triage question for potential follow-up research.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in a focus group to discuss gardening tools?
